casebody.data:
CRITERION CONSTRUCTION COMPANY v. CITY OF EAST ORANGE AND SCOTT, BUILDING INSPECTOR. Decided October 27, 1924.

Before Gumaleke, Cum? Justice. and Justices Mintubn and Black.

For the relator, Merritt Lane. For the respondent, Robert II. McCarter. Per Curiam.

'Phis case is controlled by the decision of the Oonrt of Errors and Appeals in what is generally known as the Nutley case. Ignaciunas v. Town of Nutley, 1 N. J. Adv. R. 1023.

We are required by the decision in that case to sustain the demurrer to the return to the alternative writ.

It will be so ordered.
